subject: Tennis
Gambling
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Morgan Lamri, 22, an umpire on the Futures and Challenger tours, became the first official to be suspended for gambling-related corruption by the Tennis Integrity Unit.
snippet: Morgan Lamri, 22, an umpire on the Futures and Challenger tours, became the first official to be suspended for gambling-related corruption by the Tennis Integrity Unit.
